email_share_body: Check out Elusive Origin - an immersive cultural investigation platform

testimonials.quote: #Buglary30 was so fun! It's exactly the type of event I like to attend these days. I love celebrating birthdays AND participating in a little mystery and drama!
testimonials.name: Candice Johnson

faq_items.question: What is Elusive, exactly?
faq_items.answer: Imagine a world where mysteries don’t just entertain but also spark conversations about identity and truth.  Elusive is a hybrid mystery-meets-meaning storyworld that combines immersive films, live events, and interactive tools to create premium, multi-city experiences where your decisions and theories help uncover deeper narratives. Think "Black Mirror" meets scavenger hunt meets cultural archive..

faq_items.question: What makes Elusive different?
faq_items.answer: We create authentic cultural experiences that celebrate heritage through interactive storytelling, not just entertainment or aesthetics.

faq_items.question: Is this a game or a show?
faq_items.answer:
\
Both—and neither. It’s a living storyworld. You can watch it unfold, participate in real-world mysteries, or join the Investigator Circle to influence what happens next

faq_items.question: When does it launch?
faq_items.answer: Our first chapter begins **August**. Early Investigators will get sneak previews, puzzle drops, and priority invites before the public.

faq_items.question: Do I need to be in a certain city to participate?
faq_items.answer: No! While we host IRL events, much of Elusive lives online. Investigators from anywhere in the world can explore, decode, and contribute.

faq_items.question: Is it free?
faq_items.answer: Yes for a limited time to explore, decode, and join the Circle. Paid experiences, mystery boxes, and limited event tickets may be available later for those who want to dive deeper.

signup_section_title: Join the First Wave of Truth-Seekers
hero_description:
Elusive is an immersive storytelling experience and cultural mystery platform where truth is pieced together by those brave enough to look closer. 

Not everything lost should stay hidden.
twitter_share_text: The Investigation Begins - Join the Elusive Origin community
rsvp_progress_text: Join the investigation when we reach our goal

why_join_features.title: Insider Access
why_join_features.description: Be the first to decode clues, test prototypes, and attend secret events.

why_join_features.title: Influence the Story
why_join_features.description: Your theories and choices help shape how the narrative unfolds across digital and live chapters.

why_join_features.title: Exclusive Rewards
why_join_features.description: Get early access to drops, surprise merch, and first-in-line access to limited events and missions.

signup_section_description: Get early access, behind-the-scenes clues, and a first look at the story before it unfolds.
signup_form_footer_text: No spam, just mysteries. Unsubscribe at any time.
